projects.name: Multilanguage program partitioning for trusted execution environments
projects.summary: Using GraalVM Truffle framework to implement generic AST nodes that encapsulate sensitive information in polyglot programs. Dynamic tain analysis is then leveraged to analyze and partition the AST for Intel SGX enclaves.

projects.name: Developing a configless approach for Intel SGX switchless calls
projects.summary: Design of dynamic worker thread scheduling system for switchless enclave routines

projects.name: Partitioning Java programs for Intel SGX enclaves
projects.summary: Java program partitioning via annotations and byte‑code transformations for TCB reduction in TEEs

projects.name: Using persistent memory to improve fault tolerance guarantees in TEEs
projects.summary: Leveraging Intel DC persistent memory (PM) to provide efficient fault-tolerance guarantees for Intel SGX enclaves

projects.name: Memory address translation optimization in virtualization systems
projects.summary: Modifying the Xen hypervisor to provide contiguous memory to paravirtual guest VMs

projects.name: SIMbox fraud detection
projects.summary: Developing a tool for SIMbox fraud detection based on the ELK stack
